snippet: KURZ--Rona Hoffman, passed away December 30, 2015. Beloved wife of Stanley (deceased), lovingly remembered by her children Susan Eleftherakis (Peter), Jane Klemmer (Tim), Peter Kurz (Jennifer), grandchildren Clifford, Elizabeth, Katherine, Alexander, Kerry, Devon, Michelle and Caroline, and her brother Leonard Hoffman. Her family and friends will gather for a celebration of her life on March 13. 1/3
